item.title: Making it snow
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Ok I have this in my .client

//Playercount at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@gra@Players - " + players, 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Joescape", 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673}}} //setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201
What would I add/edit to make it snow for everybody on login? So I would need you to copy this command and just add whats needed, so I can copy and paste it. I would appreciate it, thanks.

Read full topic
